geographical_features: island state with access to the Atlantic Ocean, North Sea and Irish Sea; temperate climate; mostly lowland with mountain areas in Scotland and Wales
economic_strengths: financial services, pharmaceuticals, aerospace, defense, creative industries, advanced research, maritime trade, strong higher education sector
digitalization_level: very high â€” robust ICT infrastructure, global digital services hub
political_economic_threats: post-Brexit economic uncertainty; regional secession pressures; reliance on imported energy; global financial market volatility
military_threats: Russian activity in North Atlantic, cyber attacks, terrorism, instability in proximate regions
development_milestones: long-standing constitutional monarchy; major global influence through G7, NATO, and Commonwealth; advanced post-industrial economy
